text: Gzhel is a Russian style of ceramics. Gzhel may also refer to: *Gzhel (rural locality), several rural localities in Russia *Gzhel railway station, a railway station on the Moscow–Kazan line in the vicinity of Gzhel (selo), Moscow Oblast *Gzhel (theater), a Russian dance theater of Vladimir Mikhailovich Zakharov ==See also== *Gzhelian, the youngest stage of the Pennsylvanian geologic period *Gzhelskogo kirpichnogo zavoda, a rural locality (a settlement) in Ramensky District of Moscow Oblast, Russia
title: Gzhel (disambiguation)
